name: Claw Fish
description:
PRESENTING... Claw Fish!

A fishing game where you fish with a claw!
Similar to Cat Goes Fishing, Claw fish is a relaxing fishing game where you upgrade your boat & claw to catch increasingly rare fish. See if you can catch them all!

[IMPORTANT]: Playing inside of itch is currently not working. Please play here.

Instructions:
Drop Claw - Space
Speed Up Claw - Space
Access Inventory - E
Jump Claw Up - LMB (Left Click)

Info:
Made With Love2d & Love.js
Art: Us!
Game: Us!
Music: Kyle McEvoy, Luke Otwell - Ocean View Pt. 2

Download Instructions (Click to expand)

Download Instruction
If for some reason you'd like to download it, here are some instructions.

Windows:
Download "Claw Fish | Exe", Unzip/Extract it, and double click the "clawFish.exe" file

Anything Else/Love2d:
I haven't created an actual file for this, so this one's a bit more tricky. You'll have to download the "Claw Fish | Love2d" file, unzip it, and then download Love2d to run it. This game uses love 0.10.2 (Super Toast), so if you don't already have that installed, go over there and install it. All you have to do then is drag the .love file onto the love.exe file that you downloaded just now. I've included the windows version of love2d in the download, but if you're not using windows, you'll have to download Love2d.
